title: PayPal CFO John Rainey Leaving to Join Walmart as CFO; PayPal's board has launched a formal search process to replace Rainey, who will remain at the company until late May
text:
The global customer operations team will join the risk, legal and customer operations organization led by Executive Vice President Aaron Karczmer.

Write to Denny Jacob at denny.jacob@wsj.com

PayPal CFO John Rainey Leaving to Join Walmart as CFO
